p: Table 3 shows the details of preoperative chemotherapy-related toxicities. The incidence of grade 3 or 4 toxicities was high for leukopenia, neutropenia, and nausea/vomiting. However, the incidence of febrile neutropenia (FN) was relatively low and there were no chemotherapy-related deaths. The actual total dose of each drug that was administered is shown in Table 4.
